languages.text: {n}Нет предела у отважного духа, но он есть у слабой, страшащейся боли плоти. Когда нервы Фроше начинают рваться под вашим нажимом, с уст его слетает:{/n} "Врата... Септента... пространственные врата..." {n}Слуга яростно прикусывает язык, негодуя на предательскую слабость собственного тела.{/n}

{n}Courageous spirit can overcome anything — but weak, pain-fearing flesh can't. When Froscher's nerves begin to snap under your pressure, he blurts out,{/n} "Porta... Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нет предела у отважного духа, но он есть у слабой, страшащейся боли плоти. Когда нервы Фроше начинают рваться под вашим нажимом, с уст его слетает:{/n} "Врата... Септента... пространственные врата..." {n}Слуга яростно прикусывает язык, негодуя на предательскую слабость собственного тела.{/n}

Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}

{n}Courageous spirit can overcome anything — but weak, pain-fearing flesh can't. When Froscher's nerves begin to snap under your pressure, he blurts out,{/n} "Porta... Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}顽强的精神可以战胜一切，可软弱、痛苦的肉体却做不到。弗罗舍的精神在你的折磨下开始崩溃，他高声地喊了起来。{/n}“塞葡坦……之港……次元门……”{n}随后，他暴怒地咬着自己的舌头，对自己脆弱的身体愤怒不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Courageous spirit can overcome anything — but weak, pain-fearing flesh can't. When Froscher's nerves begin to snap under your pressure, he blurts out,{/n} "Porta... Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}顽强的精神可以战胜一切，可软弱、痛苦的肉体却做不到。弗罗舍的精神在你的折磨下开始崩溃，他高声地喊了起来。{/n}“塞葡坦……之港……次元门……”{n}随后，他暴怒地咬着自己的舌头，对自己脆弱的身体愤怒不已。{/n}

languages.text: {n}勇敢な魂はどんな困難も乗り越えられる。しかし、痛みを恐れる弱い肉体には不可能だ。あなたの威圧によってフロッシャーの神経がパチンパチンと切れ始めたところで、彼はぽつりと言った。{/n}「ポルタ…セプテンタム.…超次元の門…」{n}召使は力強く舌を噛み、自身の不実な弱さに憤慨した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Courageous spirit can overcome anything — but weak, pain-fearing flesh can't. When Froscher's nerves begin to snap under your pressure, he blurts out,{/n} "Porta... Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}勇敢な魂はどんな困難も乗り越えられる。しかし、痛みを恐れる弱い肉体には不可能だ。あなたの威圧によってフロッシャーの神経がパチンパチンと切れ始めたところで、彼はぽつりと言った。{/n}「ポルタ…セプテンタム.…超次元の門…」{n}召使は力強く舌を噛み、自身の不実な弱さに憤慨した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un espíritu valiente puede superarlo todo, pero la carne débil y temerosa del dolor no. Cuando los nervios de Froscher empiezan a quebrarse bajo tu presión, él espeta:{/n} «Porta... Septentum... portal dimensional...». {n}El sirviente se muerde la lengua con rabia, enfurecido por la debilidad infiel de su cuerpo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Courageous spirit can overcome anything — but weak, pain-fearing flesh can't. When Froscher's nerves begin to snap under your pressure, he blurts out,{/n} "Porta... Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un espíritu valiente puede superarlo todo, pero la carne débil y temerosa del dolor no. Cuando los nervios de Froscher empiezan a quebrarse bajo tu presión, él espeta:{/n} «Porta... Septentum... portal dimensional...». {n}El sirviente se muerde la lengua con rabia, enfurecido por la debilidad infiel de su cuerpo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein mutiger Wille kann alles überwinden. Schwaches, Schmerzen fürchtendes Fleisch kann das nicht. Als Froschers Nerven unter deinem Dreck zu reißen zu beginnen, stößt er aus:{/n} "Porta ... Septentum ... Dimensionstor ..." {n}Der Diener beißt sich wild auf die Zunge, erzürnt über die Schwäche seines ketzerischen Körpers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Courageous spirit can overcome anything — but weak, pain-fearing flesh can't. When Froscher's nerves begin to snap under your pressure, he blurts out,{/n} "Porta... Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein mutiger Wille kann alles überwinden. Schwaches, Schmerzen fürchtendes Fleisch kann das nicht. Als Froschers Nerven unter deinem Dreck zu reißen zu beginnen, stößt er aus:{/n} "Porta ... Septentum ... Dimensionstor ..." {n}Der Diener beißt sich wild auf die Zunge, erzürnt über die Schwäche seines ketzerischen Körpers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un esprit courageux peut tout endurer, mais pas la chair, vulnérable à la souffrance. Quand les nerfs de Froscher commencent à lâcher sous la pression de vos doigts, il laisse échapper :{/n} « Le portail dimensionnel... de Porta... Septentum... » {n}Le serviteur se mord la langue, l'air furieux contre la faiblesse de son propre corps.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Courageous spirit can overcome anything — but weak, pain-fearing flesh can't. When Froscher's nerves begin to snap under your pressure, he blurts out,{/n} "Porta... Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}

Quand les nerfs de Froscher commencent à lâcher sous la pression de vos doigts, il laisse échapper :{/n} « Le portail dimensionnel... de Porta... Septentum... » {n}Le serviteur se mord la langue, l'air furieux contre la faiblesse de son propre corps.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cesur bir ruh her şeyi aşabilse de âciz ve acıya tahammülü olmayan bir beden, bundan mahrumdur. Uyguladığın baskı altında Froscher'ın sinirleri kopmaya başlayınca ağzından sözler dökülüyor.{/n} "Porta... Septentum... Boyutsal geçidi..." {n}Hizmetkâr, vücudunun itikatsız zayıflığına kızarak dilini ısırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Courageous spirit can overcome anything — but weak, pain-fearing flesh can't. When Froscher's nerves begin to snap under your pressure, he blurts out,{/n} "Porta... Septentum... dimensional gate..." {n}The servant bites his tongue furiously, livid at his body's faithless weakness.{/n}
